page.title: 03Job Survey of Clacton
page.content: We have done a survey to find out how many children's parents work in Clacton, in the local area and in London.The local area includes Colchester, Walton and Harwich. We found out that about half of the parents work in Clacton, about a fifth work outside Clacton but still locally, the rest in London and other places. I think many people work in London and other towns outside the local area because Clacton is a small town and because it has a main line railway station. We have a lot working locally bacause we have so many docks so a lot work at sea or at the docks.
